name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IP Address Checker - Proxy, VPN, Geolocation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Determine if an IP address is a Proxy or VPN connection, retrieve its Fraud Score and Geolocation on-the-go! Supports IPv4 and IPv6.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple way to check an IP address (IPv4 and IPv6):

‚úîÔ∏è determine a Proxy or VPN connection,
‚úîÔ∏è retrieve Fraud Score associated with this IP address,
‚úîÔ∏è view Geolocation!

Just select an IP address, and you are good to go! üöÄ

‚öë In order to use this extension, you will need your personal API key which you can get here for free: www.ipqualityscore.com.
Once you've logged in to your account, go to "Proxy/VPN Detection API" -> "Documentation" in the menu at the left
 - or -
simply open the following page: https://www.ipqualityscore.com/documentation/proxy-detection/overview and find your "Private Key".
This is the API key that you will need to paste into the extension pop-up window and save.

That's all!

‚ù§Ô∏è I would love to hear your feedback and ideas on how the extension can be improved.

‚ù§Ô∏è If you find it useful, you can buy me a coffee üçµ: buymeacoffee.com/abovethesky
